title: Liège (province)
extract:
Liège is a province surrounding the city by the same name in Belgium.


Cities

1 Liège - the largest city of Wallonia
2 Eupen - small town but the capital of the German speaking region of Belgium
3 Huy
4 Kelmis - capital of the former semi-state of Neutral-Morisnet.
5 Spa - the original spa, bringing health and wellness to travellers for centuries
6 St. Vith - the other major German-speaking town, also a gateway to the Ardennes and its hiking and biking trails
7 Verviers - erstwhile wool capital of Europe, with a lot of charm and heritage


Other destinations
1 Henri-Chapelle
2 Hermalle-sous-Huy
3 Neupré

Stay safe
The Liège province is safe for the most part; despite the very visible legacy of de-industrialization in many areas, the region has not suffered as much as the rest of Wallonia.
Nevertheless, places like Liège, Verviers, and some of their suburbs are not immune to pick-pocketing and aggravated assaults. Avoid being drunk or alone late at night.
